blog.name: zarryislifex

blog.description: If you think Zarry ain't real? Why are you lying to yourself? Get on the shipping train 😍 😉

summary: Reading this got me really upset...not because of the content of the book but rather how the press rather focus on miss quoted...
body:
Pages from Zayn’s book talking about 1D

Reading this got me really upset…not because of the content of the book but rather how the press rather focus on miss quoted bullshit concerning Zayn Vs 1D and not look at THIS book that is from his ACTUAL WORDS!

Zayn didn’t say he hated the boys or 1D as a whole…in fact? he hyped them up LODES in this book! He just wasn’t into the music anymore ..and that’s why he left.

It’s sad how certain people even 1D ‘fans’ can believe the press crap rather then this…it really is. But hopefully this clears something up.

reblog.comment:

It’s sad how certain people even 1D ‘fans’ can believe the press crap rather then this…it really is. But hopefully this clears something up.

title: Realms of Desire
body:
“To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves.” - Frederico Garcia Lorca (Blood Wedding and Yerma)

Dirty Little Thing

Reading took her mind off the noise from the television. Niall once again was having an all day sports binge. He was flipping back and forth between golf and football. She preferred when he watched…

Read more…

blog.name: supportourlarents
blog.title: TwoGhostsLarrie
blog.description: Long story short I'm here to discuss Larry, state my opinions and share all things Larry. Don't like what I have to say, leave. If you aren't a Larrie then you aren't welcome here. If you want to know my opinion on something message me and I'll do a post on it.

body:
“Investigate Larry Stylinson”

I might start a YouTube series. Where I talk about Larry events and shit like that. Like go into detail about stuff that has happened. Might call it “Investigate Larry Stylinson”. Anybody like this idea?
